message.content:
1. There was an incidence rate of myoclonus in the etomidate group.
2. The incidence rate of myoclonus in the etomidate group was 16.1%.
3. There was an incidence rate of myoclonus in the propofol group.
4. The incidence rate of myoclonus in the propofol group was 1.6%.
5. The incidence rate of myoclonus was higher in the etomidate group than in the propofol group.
6. The difference in the incidence rate of myoclonus between the etomidate and propofol groups was statistically significant (P = .004).

messages.content:
Statement: Moreover, the incidence rate of myoclonus was significantly higher in the etomidate group (16.1%) than in the propofol group (1.6%) (P = .004).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
